text: Of the descendants of Manasseh, registered by name and lineage according to their clans and ancestral houses, every male of twenty years or more, everyone fit for military service:
When the LORD heard your words, he was angry, and took an oath:
The Amorites hemmed in the Danites in the mountain region, not permitting them to come down onto the plain.
There Zadok the priest and Nathan the prophet shall anoint him king over Israel, and you shall blow the ram’s horn and cry, ‘Long live King Solomon!’
Abraham begot Isaac. The sons of Isaac were Esau and Israel.
There they installed a sinful race, transgressors of the law, who fortified themselves inside it.
the king, after verifying the fact, fenced the place off and declared it sacred.
He cured many who were sick with various diseases, and he drove out many demons, not permitting them to speak because they knew him.
But Mary said to the angel, “How can this be, since I have no relations with a man?”
Now I have seen and testified that he is the Son of God.” The First Disciples.
